name: Cooking Master (itch) (Infinity_n_Beyond)
description:
Controls:

Left click on the buttons on the bottom to select your mode:

CUT - Cut what you click on

HOLD - Grab what you click on

BREAK - Break what you click on

MIX - Mix whatever is inside the container

Gameplay:

In this game you will have to find the right combinations in order to get a good ending. There are 3 types of items: Raw ingredients , Containers, and the oven.

Raw ingredients can be cut, held, and broken but not mix. When a raw ingredient is held you can put it into a container

Containers can hold different ingredients and are to mix what is inside of it, but they are not able to be cut or broken

The oven is the final step, you will click on it once you want to finish your recipe. The outcome will change depending on what mode you are in and what is that you are holding
